runs.comm: gentle start from Chibhabha, inswing into Hafeez's pads who tickles it along its way to short fine leg. Lazy misfield gives them  a single
better line, fullish length outside the off stump. Shehzad plays the ball away from his body but pushes it to cover
almost carried. Some signs of the slowness of the pitch. Just a gentle length delivery on off, Shehzad plays early and pops the ball up towards cover, Raza dives in front but falls short
length delivery on off, Shehzad shuffles across and clips the ball into the vacant midwicket region
goes back to the fuller length outside off, good over so far. Hafeez plays a solid forward defensive
short this time and dispatched. Poor ball to finish. Not enough pace and just sits up for Hafeez, who helps it along to the backwards square leg boundary.
squares Shehzad up first ball. Just a length ball outside off which straightened a tad, Shehzad plays inside the line and is beaten
better from Shehzad, a lot more intent in that shot. Full and outside off, Shehzad gets a good stride forward and guides the ball to third man
a bit of swing for Panyangara. Not a lot, but just enough. Pitches a bit wide outside off and the ball swings away further. Hafeez leaves though
straighter this time, full on middle and Hafeez turns the ball to midwicket with his wrists
great shot from Hafeez, he is looking ominous here. Full and wide outside off, too much width but Hafeez plays it nicely. Waits for the ball to come to him before cutting past point for four
better line, full on off stump. Tamely patted to mid-on with the angle
Chibhabha strays on Shehzad's pads now, but he misses his flick. The ball rolls away towards square leg and they get the run
lovely stuff, tight lines. Wicket to wicket. Full and straight on off and middle. Hafeez presents the full face of the bat as he defends
another poor ball and another boundary. Hafeez is just putting the poor balls away here. Great batting. Short on leg and Hafeez rolls his wrists and plays the pull to the fine leg boundary
full outside off, Hafeez defends into the off side
well played again. Good length on middle, Hafeez plays the ball late and nudges past midwicket with powerful wrists. Well timed enough to get two
another poor delivery but Hafeez cannot capitalise this time. Slower delivery on leg stump, Hafeez gets hit on the thigh pad as he tries to flick, but the ball rolls away towards square leg
good lines, full on off. Just a hint of away movement but Hafeez gets behind the line nicely to block
full again but a bit straighter - towards middle and leg. Hafeez works the ball to short fine leg and Shehzad calls him through for one. Good running
full and outside off, Shehzad shows a lot of respect as he leaves. Giving himself a chance, which is good to see
just as I say that, Shehzad clears his front foot and smashes one over midwicket for four. Picked his shot and executed nicely. Too full from TP.

gone this time. Nothing delivery, in fact was a poor ball. Very full and very wide, Shehzad chooses to slice through the off side but gets under it and the away movement moves the ball away from Shehzad. He cuts it straight to point. Timed it beautifully but straight to the fielder. He cannot believe his luck as he trudges off
fullish length again but on off stump. Maqsood offers the full face of the bat and drives to mid-off
too full and leg side-ish. Hafeez plays across it and the ball strikes him on the pad and then goes to short fine leg
nice lines, keeping Maqsood on zero. Good length, just outside off. Maqsood pats the ball to point and wants one, but is sent back by a disbelieving Hafeez
nice shot but hits the extra cover fielder. Full and wide and nicely driven
slower delivery now. Good variations. Fuller than a good length on off and Maqsood nudges the ball to midwicket. Still on zero.
full again on a fourth-stump line. Maqsood gets forward and drives but straight to cover
Maqsood is finally off the mark. Slower full delivery on middle, and Maqsood calmly drives the ball down to long-on
short and wide, hit-me delivery and Maqsood smashes it, But straight to extra cover
gets the gap this time. Not a great ball from Williams. Short and wide, sits up for Maqsood who cuts fiercely in the gap through point
skids this one though outside off. Maqsood hits it to point
another short delivery outside off, Maqsood rocks back and finds the gap through cover. Times it nicely but the ball pulls up before the boundary. Good chase from Raza.
ooh, almost gets him. Flighted on off, Hafeez advances and tries to hit down the ground but gets too close to the ball, inside-edges it onto his pads and the ball rolls to the keeper
fullish and skiddy delivery on leg, Hafeez is struck on the body
overpitched outside off, driven in the gap through sweeper cover for one

what a soft dismissal that was! Hafeez was looking very dangerous. May have stopped on Hafeez too. Just a full delivery on middle, Hafeez clips the ball in the air but straight to midwicket who takes an easy catch by his knees. Just when Pakistan needed him to carry on after a slow Powerplay
full length outside off, Malik gets a front foot stride and defends to point
too full and too straight, gives Malik an easy delivery to get off the mark. He clips the ball to deep square leg
short and wide, may have been a legcutter but he gets four. Maqsood throws his hands at it and gets a thick outside edge which flies to the third man boundary for four.
better looking stroke. Good length outside off, Maqsood punches through cover for one
some spin for Williams. Full outside off, and the ball turns away from Maqsood who awkwardly defends to point
another boundary. This one skids through to Maqsood who plays the ball late and cuts powerfully past point. Was always going for four after it beat the fielder
skids on again, full on off. Maqsood isn't picking these. Somehow he cuts to point, almost sneaks through
slightly slow and short on off, driven to cover
well played this time, good use of the feet. Gets to the pitch of the ball and drives to long-off for one
fuller outside off, driven easily with the spin to the sweeper cover
overpitched legspinner on off, Malik works the ball to deep midwicket for one against the spin
nice flight, bowled slower through the air and the ball grips in the pitch. Maqsood drives to cover
googly this time, not picked by Maqsood who goes back trying to cut, the ball almost sneaks through again but Maqsood gets bat on it just in time
nice leg break now. Takes the outside edge of Maqsood who is struggling to read the flight and turn. The ball travels down to the third man boundary but it is pulled back
four now. Flatter on leg, Malik works the ball very fine, just gets bat on it and the ball runs to the fine leg boundary
nicely tossed up, beats Malik on the outside edge. Lots of spin in this wicket. Normal legspinner on that occasion.
quick on off stump, Maqsood gets a single. Pushes the ball down to long-off
darted in outside off, nurdled to midwicket
fired in on middle and leg, Malik works the ball to deep square leg
pushed through flat on middle which is pushed to midwicket
and there it is, another boundary. Short outside off, Malik gets down early and pulls the ball powerfully into the gap through deep square leg
Malik shuffles down the track now and works the ball with soft hands towards midiwicket, well enough to get em two. Good batting here from Malik.
legbreak again but pitched outside leg stump, Maqsood pushes the ball to midwicket. Just the one. Direct hit at the non-strikers end from Raza at long-on
fullish outside off, pushed to cover with the turn

goes this time. Tries to go over long-off but another batsman who gets too close to the ball. Advances down the track and tries to smash the ball, but the ball skews off to long-on off the inside half of the bat. Malik, too, looked set but not bad shot selection, just the execution lacking.
another boundary. Pushed through flatter outside off, Rizwan goes back and tries to cut but gets a thick edge which flies past Masakadza at slip
full on off now, Rizwan gets down early and sweeps and hits the ball to deep fine leg
nice running, Maqsood forced by Rizwan for the second run. Full on off and Maqsood hits it wide of long-on, Rizwan immediately wants two. And calls SM through
very full and wide, driven easily to the sweeper cover

another poor shot from Maqsood results in his dismissal in two consecutive games. Comes down the track and looks to power the ball over long-on, doesn't get to the pitch of the ball but goes through with the shot. The ball lobs up off the outside edge straight to point. Poor cricket from Maqsood, just struggled today.
wow, gets width first ball and smashed, Very poor ball from Utseya. Short and wide, Akmal clobbers a cut through point
too short this time and Akmal punishes this one too. Short on middle, Akmal rocks back and heaves the ball over midwicket
full outside off, pushed to cover
nice batting from Akmal. Played with soft hands. Darted in on leg, Akmal works the ball to deep square leg with very soft hands and they get through for two
legbreak on leg, Rizwan gets down early and sweeps to deep square leg
tossed up outside off, driven off to the deep cover for another single
overpitched on this occasion, Rizwan drills the ball to long-off
shorter and flatter now, but not too quick. Gives Akmal enough time to get back and nudge the ball towards midwicket
ooh, almost gets through. The skiddy topspinner on middle and leg, Rizwan wants to cut but gets bat on it just in time
flighted now on off, pushed out to cover with the turn. Excellent over
skids one on off and middle, Akmal rocks back and whips the ball to deep midwicket
tossed up on off now, nice use of the feet to get to the pitch of the ball and push the ball to long-off with the turn
skids one on again outside off, Akmal pushes the ball towards midwicket. They settle for one, but a misfield means they scamper back for the second
slow and short and wide outside off, Akmal cuts to the sweeper
another drifter, comes on with the arm. Rizwan is hustled a bit for time, and gets a leading edge towards cover after the ball spins a touch.
flat on off stump, Akmal is hanging on the back foot and pushes the ball to long-on for another single.
too full on off, but Akmal can only push the ball back to the bowler
nicely bowled, slower through the air and lands it on off, the ball grips and takes the leading edge towards point
too full now, Akmal clips he ball in the gap at square leg allowing them the second run
a bit too short now, Akmal goes back quickly and pulls uppishly in the gap through midwicket
beautifully bowled, tossed up on leg and the ball spins away from Akmal but he defends nicely
quicker and flat now on leg, the line allows Akmal to push to long-on with no hassle against the spin
short on leg, no turn, skids onto Umar who squirts the ball to deep square leg
tossed up outside off, Rizwan dances down the track and swats the ball over cover for two. Not excellently timed but good enough for two
flat and quick on off, driven to cover for one
very quick on off again, fired that in, Umar clips the ball towards midwicket looking for two but Raza is quick on it
nice sweep now. Tossed up on leg and Rizwan sweeps in the gap towards deep square leg but some good fielding prevents the second
ripper, absolute beaut. Beats Akmal all ends up. Pitches on off and spins away, Akmal wants to play the ball on the leg side but is squared up.
slower delivery on a fifth-stump line, good option with third man up. Rizwan steers the ball to short third man and is sent back by Umar
nice follow up. Full outside off, speared in. Rizwan is beaten on the inside edge
short slower ball outside off this time, Rizwan gets up on his feet and heaves the ball along the ground in the gap towards midwicket for two
he goes this time though. Slower delivery on leg, Rizwan plays an awkward half-sweep, half-pull but can only lob the ball in the air to long-on. Easy catch for Williams.
full delivery on middle and leg, pushed to long-on for the single
slower full toss on leg stump, a perfect delivery for Afridi but he pushes the ball into the gap at midwicket for two. Nicely played there from Afridi.
excellent yorker outside off. Absolutely nothing Umar could do about that. All he can do is dig the ball out back to the bowler
speared in the blockhole outside off, squeezed out to deep point. Afridi wants two but Umar says no
what was that? Afridi tries to play the ramp over fine leg, he gets across off stump and gets the perfect delivery to play that shot. A length delivery outside leg,misses it though. Called wide

and that is the end of Afridi. Very badly timed and the ball lobs down Williams' throat at long-off. It is a length delivery outside off, Afridi goes back to his preferred shot of smashing the ball down the ground. But the ball catches the outside half the bat, and Afridi holes out. the bat may have turned in his hands too
slower full toss on leg stump, good delivery. Akmal whips the ball to midwicket
ugly hoick first up. Very full and wide outside off, Imad wants to sweep that but he is beaten by the length.
excellent finish. Wide yorker inside the wide-line. Wasim comes down the track and also gives himself room but the ball is too wide for him and is beaten. Good ball.
superb death bowling this. Very full yorker outside off, Akmal pats the ball to point for just one
smashed this time for four. Much needed boundary. Very wide outside off and Wasim plays a nice cover drive in the air with a lot of power. Races to the boundary
short offcutter on off stump, swatted away to deep midwicket for one
full outside off, not a bad option at all. Akmal uppishly clobbers the ball down the ground, with not great timing. goes on the bounce to long-off for one
low full toss outside off, Wasim powerfully hits the ball but straight to cover. Just one

falls safe this time! Full delivery outside off, this one was in the arc though to smash anywhere. Akmal looks to hit the ball too hard and the ball lobs up again but falls safe behind point. He gets away with that
gets a boundary first ball, excellent shot, wide yorker outside off. Wasim moves across and slices the ball wide of point for four. Much needed for Pakistan.
slower delivery outside off now. Very wide but inside the wide guideline. Wasim misses his heave and is beaten
extremely full and wide outside off, nice execution this from TP. Wasim slices another drive to the sweeper cover and immediately calls for two, they get it easily
aah, low full toss outside off. Wasim can only ill-time his swipe to long-on
first six of the innings that. Short slower delivery outside off, Akmal hangs back and swats the ball wide of long-on, clears the boundary. Another vital boundary

full and wide outside off, in fact was a low full toss again. Akmal creams the drive through to deep cover. Just the one though. And Pakistan finish with 136 again. An identical score to what they scored in the first T20
